business.pricing: Appraisal fees vary by collection size and complexity. Contact Aspen Antique Appraisals in Aspen, CO for a tailored quote.

content.about: Aspen Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Aspen area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Aspen Antique Appraisals serves Aspen, CO with antique appraisal support focused on Antique Furniture, Vintage Collectibles.

reviews.author: Elizabeth A.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: David B.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: David B.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Their expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: Jessica J.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.
